table.name: vtiger_cboffers
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `vtiger_cboffers` ( `cboffersid` INT(11) NOT NULL, `cboffersno` VARCHAR(255) DEFAULT NULL, `subject` VARCHAR(100) DEFAULT NULL, `related_client` INT(40) DEFAULT NULL, `offer_status` VARCHAR(100) DEFAULT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`cboffersid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8

table.name: vtiger_cbofferscf
table.sql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `vtiger_cbofferscf` ( `cboffersid` INT(11) NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY (`cboffersid`) ) ENGINE=InnoDB DEFAULT CHARSET=utf8
